title: [W]Hearing preference
legend: [W]Would you be able to take part in hearings by video and phone? (optional)
hearingText1: [W]If your case goes to a hearing, it can take place either:
hearingBullet1: [W]in person, in a room at a tribunal (‘face-to-face’)
hearingBullet2: [W]by video (where you can join from a place suitable to you)
hearingText2: [W]Some hearings use a combination of these methods. The approach taken will be decided by a judge. It may depend on the type of claim.
checkboxVideo: [W]Yes, I can take part in video hearings
checkboxPhone: [W]Yes, I can take part in phone hearings

hearingPreference.required: [W]Select whether you can take part in video or phone hearings

hiddenErrorField.sessionRespondent: [W]Unable to find selected respondent in session
hiddenErrorField.userId: [W]Invalid session user. User does not have an ID
hiddenErrorField.api: [W]A system error occurred, Please try again later
